title: just asking!
body: can rito sue my isp and rekt them? they are shady af, but they can do what they want thanks to monopoly and i cant do anything about it cuz nobody cares, imo i can be second Faker (or not) but sadly i cant play (stressless, without ping 2-3 times higher than it should be and sometimes mega packet loss) my favourite game or any online games at all since september last year... yeah its just another rito pls/qq post

replies.body:
Hmm I don't know anything about legal stuff, but we do have campaigns for ISPs to reach us and get added to Riot Direct as [peering partners](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210665503-NA-Peering-Partners).  You should hit up your ISP and ask them to join!   

In the meantime, you might be able to adjust how your network is getting to us in case it's taking a long way.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, especially configuring your DNS to help re-route.  Hopefully that can help in the mean time!  My poro shoulders are here for you!
